app.title: D-ID: AI Video Generator
app.description:
D-ID’s Creative Reality™ studio AI video generator mobile app lets you create AI videos of digital people from a single image quickly, and easily from your phone. With endless creativity, the power of D-ID’s flagship AI video generator desktop studio is now in your hands. 

Create captivating videos featuring talking avatars, as your AI videos spring to life in seconds. Whether capturing a moment of inspiration or working on a project, quickly and simply generate AI videos featuring digital people—all from your mobile device. It’s the ultimate tool for creating engaging, personalized content, wherever you are.
All it takes is an idea, and here, you harness the full might of the AI video generator to create a one-of-a-kind video, complete with a customized avatar.

The app's versatility is a game-changer for those on the move, offering a seamless experience that transforms your surroundings into a dynamic canvas for creation. With the power of AI at your fingertips, the app empowers you to generate stunning AI videos anytime, anywhere. Whether you’re at a bustling café or riding the train to work, the AI video generator’s capabilities remain boundless. The fusion of user-friendly design and sophisticated AI technology makes this tool an invaluable asset for professionals, enthusiasts, and anyone seeking to explore the extraordinary possibilities at the intersection of creativity and AI. Innovate, inspire, and captivate—it all begins with the touch of your screen.


Using the AI video generator, turn still images into speaking digital people in seconds with the D-ID Creative Reality™ studio mobile app.
* Choose a digital person: Tailor your avatars with a face that matches your vision. Choose an existing photorealistic or illustrated face from the built-in library or upload an image of your own from your photo roll and use D-ID’s AI video generator to bring it to life. 
* Speak any Language: Connect with a global audience by creating a video of your digital person speaking in 120 languages.
* Create Anywhere You Go: With D-ID’s AI video generator, the power of Text-to-video animation is now in the palm of your hand.
* AI Video Magic: Your creative companion transforms text and images into videos with talking avatars.
* Instant Animation: AI brings your avatars to life with videos, making them shine with charisma and charm.
* Personalize Speech: Customize your AI avatar's voice effortlessly. Upload voice recordings, or use text-to-speech to determine what you want your digital person to say.

Empower Your Creative Journey:

* Effortless Creation: With a single click, you'll have an MP4 AI video ready. Turn your avatars into stars, craft talking collectibles, integrate them into interactive games, enhance presentations, or infuse your chatbot with an unforgettable user experience.

Unleash your imagination through an intuitive AI video generator to breathe life into your ideas. Whether you’re a content creator, a marketing enthusiast, or exploring your own digital expression using AI, the Creative Reality™ studio is your gateway to limitless creativity. From storytelling to marketing campaigns, this AI video generator amplifies your ability to engage and resonate with audiences on a whole new level. Craft compelling narratives, revolutionize social media content, or simply have fun generating dynamic, lifelike video personas for personal use—your creativity sets the only boundary.

Explore your creative potential with the Creative Reality™ studio AI video generator. Download it today and take your content to new heights.

app.summary: Transform your ideas into videos with talking avatars using Generative AI.

reviews.text: As a user of Al video generators, I find the technology incredibly efficient and time-saving. The platform simplifies the video creation process through automation, offering a wide range of templates, customization options, and user-friendly interfaces. The Al's ability to generate videos based on provided content or scripts is impressive. However, occasional fine-tuning might be necessary for specific preferences or nuances. One super app
reviews.replyText: Hello! Thanks for sharing your feedback about our app. We're happy to hear that you're enjoying its usage.

reviews.text: Utilizing AI video generators has proven to be a game-changer for me. This cutting-edge technology not only streamlines the video creation process but also provides an extensive array of templates and customization features within user-friendly interfaces. The AI's capacity to craft videos from given content or scripts is truly remarkable. While it's incredibly efficient, occasional adjustments may be needed for specific preferences or nuances. A truly outstanding application.
reviews.replyText: Hello! Appreciate you for dedicating time to check out our app. We're thrilled to learn that you find it enjoyable to use.

reviews.text: This app should be removed from play store immediately, I'm not happy with your video production because you painted all my video with your DID watermark which is very annoying and for that, I will not use the app again I can't pay 5000 for you to paint all my video with watermark it's not like that on the free trial, your new update will ruin your business because your video is painted with watermark and also the voice does not speak, so fix this problem ASAP.
reviews.replyText: Hi Michael, sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact our team at mobilesupport@d-id.com to share more details and let us assist you. Thank you!

reviews.text: I noticed an inconvenient nuance, therefore 4 stars only: when you test out the speech with an avatar, it all of a sudden goes through the phone speaker, even though the wireless headphones were connected, and up to this moment sound went through them. Pretty inconvenient, if you are trying to be as silent as possible (say someone sleeps near you), and the phone STARTS SPEAKING FULL VOLUME 🙄 It's good that I didn't voice anything stupid, that I would regret saying out loud)) Fix this please)
reviews.replyText: Hey there, sorry to hear about that. We encourage you to reach out to our team at mobilesupport@d-id.com so you can tell us more about this, and allow us to help. Thanks!

reviews.text: The app is not working properly on my phone. I have been trying to sign up into the app but it keeps declining. I tried to create a video with the image from my gallery but it doesn't work. It's really frustrating because I can't access more features from the app.. Developers should work on it, in order to make it functional in all devices.
reviews.replyText: Hello Eyo , we apologize for any inconvenience you're facing with the app. If you haven't already, please feel free to reach out to our team at mobilesupport@d-id.com. We're here to assist you and address any issues or questions you may have.

reviews.text: It says "Start now, it's free." And when you upload your photo, chose the voice, there is "free" trial but you need to write your credit card credentials. I am not going to put it on some app I even don't know if I ever use again. The choice of voices there are all robotics and you can't upload your own voice. At least not on this "free" trial.
reviews.replyText: Hello there! You can enjoy a 14-day trial of the app by selecting one of our plans just by using your card. If you choose to unsubscribe within this period, no charges will be incurred. For additional assistance regarding voice, please get in touch with us at mobilesupport@d-id.com, and we'll gladly assist you from there.

reviews.text: I think these tools have a lot of potential, as they can help people create videos without having to do the time-consuming work of filming and editing. However, I also think that there are some potential downsides, such as the risk of AI-generated content being used to spread misinformation. Overall, I think that AI video generators are a very interesting and potentially powerful tool, but it's important to use them responsibly and with a critical eye
reviews.replyText: Hello! We sincerely appreciate you taking a moment to share your thoughts on our app. It brings us great joy to learn that your experience with our application has been positive and enjoyable. Your feedback fuels our motivation to continue delivering a high-quality user experience. Thank you for being a valued user of our app!

reviews.text: don't recommend at all , first you will see everything like it's too easy and made you think it's free than after you set everything they require your sign-up / sign in , than after you do you will suprise that you have to pay to create the video !!! so they made the email required before just to collect your email so no matter you pay or not they already have your email address and can sell it if they want or make you have a lot of ads .
reviews.replyText: Hello there! We regret any confusion caused. You can enjoy a 14-day trial of the app by selecting one of our plans. If you choose to unsubscribe within this period, no charges will be incurred. For additional assistance, please get in touch with us at mobilesupport@d-id.com, and we'll gladly assist you from there.

reviews.text: Giving it a solid 4 solid stars because the talking head Avatars doesn't have any expressions that matches what it says. It's been over a year now, there ought to have being an upgrade in that regard. Other AI models are moving at a faster pace, but D.ID is just too comfortable with this level. Please we need more facial expressions to make our audience connect more to the Avatars. Thanks.
reviews.replyText: Hi there! We really appreciate you taking the time to review our app. Please reach us out for any queries or feedback at mobilesupport@d-id.com.

reviews.text: The website and the app are like two different businesses. Very confusing. One star for now. It's even hard to give you my money. I can't even do that LOL. I was going to do a free trial because the website says there is a free trial, but then that doesn't even work. Since the button on the website for the free trial pretty much leads to nowhere, I was just going to buy the least expensive service plan to test this thing out. But no. Can't do that. I guess you don't want my money 🤷🏽‍
reviews.replyText:
Hello :)
You can try the app for 14 days after subscribing to one of the plans. if you unsubscribe before the 14 days you won't be charged.

app.AIReview:
D-ID: AI Video Generator – App Review

Overview

D-ID: AI Video Generator is an ambitious mobile application aiming to democratize access to advanced AI video generation technology. Leveraging the popular desktop version of the same name, it allows users to transform a single image into a talking avatar video with remarkable speed and ease. With over 2.2 million installs and a solid 4.4-star rating (based on 34,053 user reviews), the app has clearly found an audience hungry for creative tools powered by Generative AI. The core concept is simple: upload a photo – be it your own likeness or a royalty-free image – and then utilize D-ID’s engine to synthesize speech onto the avatar, creating dynamic video content in seconds. This review delves into the app's functionality, usability, strengths, weaknesses, and ultimately, whether it represents a worthwhile investment for users seeking to explore this emerging technology.

Key Features

The D-ID mobile application boasts a feature set directly mirroring its desktop counterpart, designed to streamline the AI video creation process:

  • Image Upload & Processing: Users can upload images from their gallery or take a new photo directly within the app. The processing time varies depending on image complexity and server load but is generally quite fast – often completing within 15-30 seconds for standard resolutions.
  • Text-to-Speech Engine: The heart of the application lies in its text-to-speech engine, powered by D-ID’s Creative Reality™ technology. Users can input custom scripts or utilize pre-defined voices (currently offering English and potentially expanding languages in future updates). Voice selection impacts realism significantly.
  • Avatar Customization: While limited on mobile, the app offers basic avatar customization options, including adjusting lip syncing to better match the spoken audio and controlling animation speed. More advanced features like detailed facial expression control are currently restricted to the desktop version.
  • Video Export Options: Users can export their generated videos in various resolutions (720p, 1080p) and formats (MP4). The app includes a simple editing tool for trimming video length before exporting.
  • Cloud Integration: All processing happens in the cloud, eliminating the need for powerful local hardware to generate high-quality AI videos.

Strengths

Several aspects contribute to D-ID’s popularity and positive user feedback:

  • Ease of Use: The app's intuitive interface makes it remarkably easy to use, even for individuals with no prior video editing or AI experience. The process – upload image, type script, generate – is extremely straightforward.
  • Speed & Efficiency: Generating videos is impressively fast, often taking less than a minute for typical creations. This rapid turnaround time is a significant advantage in situations where quick content generation is needed.
  • Creative Potential: The app unlocks exciting creative possibilities across various niches, including marketing, education, entertainment, and personal projects. Imagine creating explainer videos with a talking avatar or generating personalized greetings for clients.
  • Accessibility: The free version provides access to the core functionality, allowing users to experiment with AI video generation without any financial commitment.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, D-ID: AI Video Generator has several areas where it could be improved:

  • Limited Customization: The lack of granular customization options on mobile – particularly advanced facial expressions and avatar tweaking – restricts creative control compared to the desktop version.
  • Voice Quality Variation: While the text-to-speech engine is generally good, voice quality can vary significantly depending on the script and selected voice. Some voices sound robotic or unnatural.
  • Subscription Model Pressure: The free version has limitations on video length and features. The push to upgrade to a subscription model feels somewhat aggressive, especially considering the core functionality works reasonably well.
  • Processing Time Variability: While generally fast, processing times can fluctuate significantly based on server load, occasionally leading to frustrating delays for users.

User Experience

The user experience is largely positive due to the app’s intuitive design and rapid video generation speed. The interface is clean and uncluttered, guiding users through each step of the process seamlessly. The drag-and-drop functionality within the editor is straightforward. However, the reliance on cloud processing can occasionally lead to a slight lag in responsiveness, particularly when uploading larger images. The app’s onboarding tutorial is helpful but could benefit from more detailed guidance on advanced customization techniques (which are primarily available in the desktop version).

Value for Money

As a free application, D-ID offers significant value for initial experimentation with AI video generation. The free tier allows users to explore the capabilities of the technology and determine if it aligns with their creative needs. However, unlocking the full potential – longer videos, more advanced customization options, and removal of usage limits – requires subscribing to one of the premium tiers. The pricing structure is currently at $9.99/month or $69.99/year, which represents a reasonable cost for those who intend to utilize the app regularly but may feel somewhat steep for casual users.

Conclusion

D-ID: AI Video Generator is a surprisingly powerful and accessible mobile application that democratizes access to cutting-edge Generative AI video creation. Its ease of use, speed, and creative potential outweigh its limitations, particularly given the free tier availability. While it lacks some of the advanced features found in the desktop version, it provides an excellent entry point for users curious about exploring this rapidly evolving technology. With continued development and improvements – specifically addressing voice quality variability and refining customization options – D-ID has the potential to become an industry standard for creating engaging AI video content on the go. It earns a solid 4.2 out of 5 stars, recommended particularly for beginners and those seeking rapid prototyping.
